Built with Alectryon, running Lean4 v4.3.0. Bubbles () indicate interactive fragments: hover for details, tap to reveal contents. Use Ctrl+↑ Ctrl+↓ to navigate, Ctrl+🖱️ to focus. On Mac, use ⌘ instead of Ctrl.
import Mathlib.Data.Real.EReal
import Mathlib.Analysis.InnerProductSpace.Basic
import Mathlib.MeasureTheory.Measure.Lebesgue.Basic
import Mathlib.MeasureTheory.Integral.Bochner

import NMDSProofs.Utils

local macro_rules | `($x ^ $y) => `(HPow.hPow $x $y)

open scoped RealInnerProductSpace
open BigOperators Finset ENNReal NNReal MeasureTheory

set_option trace.Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite true
set_option maxHeartbeats 4000000

variable {d : ℕ}

variable [MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)] [MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)] [MeasureSpace ℝ]

variable (μ : Measure (Vector ℝ d))

variable [IsProbabilityMeasure μ]

variable (h_m_set : ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s)

/-=====================================RKHS SECTION=====================================-/

/-
  Here we define the product RKHS and we prove that H ⊆ L²(μ)
-/

/-
  We define a RKHS of ((Vector ℝ d) → ℝ) functions.
-/
variable (H₀ : Set ((Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)) [NormedAddCommGroup ((Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)] [InnerProductSpace ℝ ((Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)]

/- The kernel function -/
variable (k : (Vector ℝ d) → (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ) (h_k : (∀ (x : (Vector ℝ d)), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ (∀ (x : (Vector ℝ d)), (fun y ↦ k y x) ∈ H₀))

/--
  Reproducing propriety
-/
def is_kernel := ∀ (f : (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ), f ∈ H₀ → ∀ (x : (Vector ℝ d)), f x = ⟪f, k x⟫

/--
  Positive definite kernel

  For simplicity in the Lean formalism, we define vector-valued function as follows:
  Let f be a function on ℝᵈ to ℝᵈ. The same function in our Lean formalism writes:
  f' : ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
       i ↦ x ↦ f(x)ⁱ
-/
def positive_definite_kernel := ∀ (f : ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ), (0 ≤ ∫ x in Set.univ, (∫ x' in Set.univ, (∑ i in range (d + 1), f i x * k x x' * f i x') ∂μ) ∂μ) ∧ (∫ x in Set.univ, (∫ x' in Set.univ, (∑ i in range (d + 1), f i x * k x x' * f i x') ∂μ) ∂μ = 0 ↔ ∀x, ∀i, f i x = 0)

variable (h_kernel : is_kernel H₀ k) (h_kernel_positive : positive_definite_kernel μ k)

/- We define the product RKHS as a space of function on ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) to ℝ (vector-valued function in our Lean formalism). A function belongs to such a RKHS if f = (f_1, ..., f_d) and ∀ 1 ≤ i ≤ d, fᵢ ∈ H₀. -/
variable {H : Set (ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)} [NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)] [InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)]

def product_RKHS (H : Set (ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)) (H₀ : Set ((Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)) := ∀ f ∈ H, ∀ (i : ℕ), i ∈ range (d + 1) → f i ∈ H₀

def inner_product_H (H : Set (ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)) := ∀ f ∈ H, ∀ g ∈ H, ⟪f, g⟫ = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ⟪f i, g i⟫

variable [NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)] [InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)] [CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)]
/--
  The simple vector norm
-/
def norm_H (H : Set (ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)) := ∀ f ∈ H, ∀x, (‖fun i ↦ f i x‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞) = sqrt (∑ i in range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊^2)


def integral_is_finite (μ : Measure (Vector ℝ d)) (f : (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ) := ∃ (C : ℝ≥0), ∫⁻ x in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal |f x| ∂μ < C

/--
  H ⊆ L2(μ) i.e., ∀ f ∈ H, ∫⁻ Ω ||f x||^2 ∂μ < ∞.
-/
theorem H_subset_of_L2 (μ : Measure (Vector ℝ d)) (h1 : product_RKHS H H₀) (h2 : integral_is_finite μ (fun x ↦ k x x)) (h3 : norm_H H) : ∀ f ∈ H, ∫⁻ x in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i ↦ f i x‖^2 ∂μ < ∞ :=

Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
∀ f ∈ H, ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)

h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x

∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤


  -- We rewrite the absolute value of a norm as positive norm.

∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤

  -- We use the property of H to rewrite the norm as a sum of norm of function in H₀
  
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ

inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝

inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
x: Vector ℝ d
↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s

inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] NNReal.sq_sqrt:1000, ↑NNReal.sqrt (∑ i in Finset.range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2) ^
      2 ==> ∑ i in Finset.range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @ENNReal.coe_finset_sum:1000, ↑(∑ i in Finset.range (d + 1),
        ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2) ==> ∑ a in Finset.range (d + 1), ↑(‖f a x‖₊ ^ 2)
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @ENNReal.coe_pow:1000, ↑(‖f x x✝‖₊ ^ 2) ==> ↑‖f x x✝‖₊ ^ 2
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ∑ x_1 in Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖f x_1 x‖₊ ^ 2 =
      ∑ x_1 in Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖f x_1 x‖₊ ^ 2 ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
∀ f ∈ H, ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] H_norm:1000, ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 ==> ∑ i in Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2

H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤


  -- We use the reproducing propriety of H₀ to rewrite f i x as ⟪f i, k x⟫.
  
d: ℕ

h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀

inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2

finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
x: Vector ℝ d
i: ℕ
iInRange: i ∈ range (d + 1)
f i x = inner (f i) (k x)
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H

finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
temp: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), f i x = inner (f i) (k x)
x: Vector ℝ d
i: ℕ
iInRange: i ∈ range (d + 1)
↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 = ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
∀ f ∈ H, ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤

      ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 ==> ∑ i in Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤


  -- Coersive squared Cauchy-Schwarz inequality : (↑‖⟪f i, k x⟫‖₊)² ≤ (↑‖f i‖₊)² (↑‖f x‖₊)².

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2

abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
x: Vector ℝ d
i: ℕ
_iInRange: i ∈ range (d + 1)
distrib: ↑(‖f i‖₊ * ‖k x‖₊) = ↑‖f i‖₊ * ↑‖k x‖₊
↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2

finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2

distrib: ↑(‖f i‖₊ * ‖k x‖₊) = ↑‖f i‖₊ * ↑‖k x‖₊
h
↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ≤ ↑(‖f i‖₊ * ‖k x‖₊)
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)

μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2

inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)

abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
x: Vector ℝ d
i: ℕ
_iInRange: i ∈ range (d + 1)
distrib: ↑(‖f i‖₊ * ‖k x‖₊) = ↑‖f i‖₊ * ↑‖k x‖₊
nn_cauchy: ‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ≤ ‖f i‖₊ * ‖k x‖₊
h
↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ≤ ↑(‖f i‖₊ * ‖k x‖₊)

  -- If f ≤ g, ∑ i in s, f ≤ ∑ i in s, g. Thus, ∑ i in range (d + 1), (↑‖⟪f i, k x⟫‖₊)² ≤ ∑ i in range (d + 1), (↑‖f i‖)² * (↑‖k x‖₊)².
  
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤


  -- A lower-Lebesgue integral of a finite sum is equal to a finite sum of lower-Lebesgue integral.

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2

inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), Measurable ((fun i x => ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2) i)
d: ℕ

inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2

  -- Retrieve the majorant of the finite sum : ∑ i in range (d + 1), (↑‖f i‖₊)².
  
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
finite_sum: ∃ C, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s

k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ

d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)

μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)

h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
intro
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤


  -- Retrieve the majorant of the integral ∫⁻ (x : (Vector ℝ d)) in Set.univ, ↑|k x x| ∂μ, supposed finite.
  
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal |(fun x => k x x) x| ∂μ < ↑C2
intro.intro
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤


  -- Rewrite ↑|k x x| as  ↑‖k x x‖₊.
  
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal |(fun x => k x x) x| ∂μ < ↑C2
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
intro.intro
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => k x x
h3: norm_H H
∀ f ∈ H, ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)

h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀

h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| ∂μ < ↑C2
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
intro.intro
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] abs_to_nnorm:1000, ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| ==> ↑‖k x x‖₊

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1

h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2

finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
intro.intro
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤


  -- 1. ∀ f ≤ g, ∫⁻ x, f x ∂μ ≤ ∫⁻ x, g x ∂μ. We use this lemma with *sum_le*.

inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)

h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0

C2: ℝ≥0

h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2

inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)

μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)

h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀

inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

s: Set ℝ≥0∞
_hs: MeasurableSet s
MeasurableSet ((fun x => ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2) ⁻¹' s)
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
Measurable fun x => ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙

inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝

k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀

h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)

inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)

h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

∀ (i : ℕ),

abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2

sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
is_measurable: Measurable fun x => ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
i: ℕ
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
is_measurable: Measurable fun x => ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
∀ (i : ℕ),
  ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
    ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
is_measurable: Measurable fun x => ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
const_int: ∀ (i : ℕ),
  ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
    ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] const_int:1000, ∫⁻ (x_1 : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ,
      ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x_1‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ ==> ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ∑ x in Finset.range (d + 1),
        ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
      ∑ x in Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙


  -- Rewrite  (↑‖k x‖₊)² as ↑‖⟪k x, k x⟫‖₊ (lot of coercions).
  _ = ∑ i in range (d + 1), (‖f i‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞)^2 * ∫⁻ (x : (Vector ℝ d)) in Set.univ, (‖⟪k x, k x⟫‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞) ∂μ :=

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ

inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] fun x ↦ nn_norm_eq_norm (k x):1000, ↑‖k x‖₊ ==> ENNReal.ofReal ‖k x‖
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)

h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ x in range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖k x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ

inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0

C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ x in range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖k x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] fun x ↦
      enn_square (norm_nonneg (k x)):1000, ENNReal.ofReal ‖k x‖ ^ 2 ==> ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2)

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ x in range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ

H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ x in range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

∑ x in range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ

∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2

f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2

abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
x: Vector ℝ d
inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)

μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝

H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0

∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] IsROrC.ofReal_real_eq_id:1000, IsROrC.ofReal ==> id
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @id_eq:1000, id ‖k x‖ ==> ‖k x‖
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ‖k x‖ ^ 2 = ‖k x‖ ^ 2 ==> True

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ

abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2
∑ x in range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] norm_sq_eq_inner:1000, inner (k x) (k x) ==> ‖k x‖ ^ 2

sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2
∑ x in range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ x in range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖‖k x‖ ^ 2‖₊ ∂μ
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2
∑ x in range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ x in range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖‖k x‖ ^ 2‖₊ ∂μ
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ

f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ

H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2

inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0

h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) = ↑‖‖k x‖ ^ 2‖₊

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2
x: Vector ℝ d
ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) = ↑‖‖k x‖ ^ 2‖₊
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) = ↑‖‖k x‖ ^ 2‖₊
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s

h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k

inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2

H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0

abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0

abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) = ↑‖‖k x‖ ^ 2‖₊
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @norm_pow:1000, ‖‖k x‖ ^ 2‖ ==> ‖‖k x‖‖ ^ 2
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @norm_norm:1001, ‖‖k x‖‖ ==> ‖k x‖
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) = ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙

abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊

cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ

h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = ‖k x‖ ^ 2
coe: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) = ↑‖‖k x‖ ^ 2‖₊
∑ x in range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ x in range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖‖k x‖ ^ 2‖₊ ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] coe:1000, ENNReal.ofReal (‖k x‖ ^ 2) ==> ↑‖‖k x‖ ^ 2‖₊
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ∑ x in Finset.range (d + 1),
        ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖‖k x‖ ^ 2‖₊ ∂μ =
      ∑ x in Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖‖k x‖ ^ 2‖₊ ∂μ ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙


  -- Use the reproducing propriety of H₀ to write ⟪k x, k x⟫ as k x x.
  _ = ∑ i in range (d + 1), (‖f i‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞)^2 * ∫⁻ (x : (Vector ℝ d)) in Set.univ, (‖k x x‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞) ∂μ := 
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ
