H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = k x x
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2

cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2

abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1

abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ

H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
reproducing_prop: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), inner (k x) (k x) = k x x
∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖inner (k x) (k x)‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] reproducing_prop:1000, inner (k x) (k x) ==> k x x
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ∑ x in Finset.range (d + 1),
        ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ =
      ∑ x in Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙


  -- As the integral is a constant in the sum, write ∑ i in ... * ∫⁻ ... as (∑ i in ...) * ∫⁻ ...
  _ = (∑ i in range (d + 1), (‖f i‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞)^2) * ∫⁻ (x : (Vector ℝ d)) in Set.univ, (‖k x x‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞) ∂μ := 
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  (∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  (∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ

k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ

H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
(∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ
Goals accomplished! 🐙

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  (∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ

h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
sum_mul: (∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ
∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  (∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
sum_mul: (∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ
(∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  (∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙


  -- Rewrite (↑‖f i‖₊)² as ↑(‖f i‖₊²) to use the *finite_sum* lemma.
  _ = (∑ i in range (d + 1), (‖f i‖₊^2 : ℝ≥0∞)) * ∫⁻ (x : (Vector ℝ d)) in Set.univ, (‖k x x‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞) ∂μ := 
Goals accomplished! 🐙

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
coe_sq: ∀ (i : ℕ), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 = ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2)
(∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  (∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2)) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ

f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
coe_sq: ∀ (i : ℕ), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 = ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2)
(∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  (∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2)) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] coe_sq:1000, ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 ==> ↑(‖f x‖₊ ^ 2)
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, (∑ x in Finset.range (d + 1), ↑(‖f x‖₊ ^ 2)) *
        ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ =
      (∑ x in Finset.range (d + 1), ↑(‖f x‖₊ ^ 2)) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙


  -- Bound the product from above using the two previously retrieved majorants.
  _ < C1 * C2 := ENNReal.mul_lt_mul finite_sum h2

  -- C1 C2 ∈ ℝ≥0
  _ < ∞ := 
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
inst✝¹⁰: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁹: MeasureSpace (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁸: MeasureSpace ℝ
μ✝: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: IsProbabilityMeasure μ✝
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁶: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁵: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
k: Vector ℝ d → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
h_k: (∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), k x ∈ H₀) ∧ ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), (fun y => k y x) ∈ H₀
h_kernel: is_kernel H₀ k
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ✝ k
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: CompleteSpace (ℕ → ℝ)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
↑C1 * ↑C2 < ⊤

  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

h2✝: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2

finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖inner (f i) (k x)‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x => ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i in range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖k x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i in range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |k x x| = ↑‖k x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖k x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
↑C1 * ↑C2 < ⊤
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
